column4: Hey guys something odd is happening, I don't get the outlines of my windows and I'm missing my multi deskop displays y'know 1-4 it was working fine last time I booted anyone know what happened?
I can't even seem to drag my windows around
Did you have xgl installed, Hopefully you never used the Automatix script Change anything else of interest?
I would see if you can get help in XGL or Automatix...
